trends: There have been no other sightings in Waldoboro
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside walking my dog before bed time at 12:15 am realy clear night lots of stars, we have a lot of planes that fly over this area going an coming from europe so i know what a plane looks like at night, this was not a plane or helicoperter, i look towards the east over the hills and there was a cluster of flashing lights, red,green,orang,white,ran in my hous an got my binoculors, to get a better look, the lights were brighter and seem to reflect off my binoculors when flashing,could not make out a shape to far away, just lights, i watched it for about an hour an 15 minutes, it seems to move up an down, left an right from time to time, it was still ther when i went to bed would like to know what this was?
Summary: Flashing lights hovering no sound, little movement.
